def_en: The Commonwealth is an organization consisting of the United Kingdom and most of the countries that were previously under its rule.

def_cn: 联邦，联合体(用于正式名称中)
def_en: Commonwealth is used in the official names of some countries, groups of countries, or parts of countries.

def_cn: (关系友好、有共同点的国家组成的)团体
def_en: If you refer to a commonwealth of nations, you are referring to a group of countries who are friendly towards each other and have something in common.
